sources.title: Under The Cock-eyed Moon (1930 Short, Film Noir, Comedy)
sources.description: PLOT : Harve & Chester search for peace & quiet in the Arizona desert, with Lizzy, their personality jalopy. Arriving in town they run into antics and adventure. First, saving pretty miss from drunken bully. _IMDb ** The non-profit streaming of the commercial free, quality films I have very much enjoyed and therefore uploaded to archive.org , are for educational purposes. I have uploaded each movie for posterity , with the hope that all present and future generations will learn from and enjoy them, as much as I have. I own zero rights to this film, nor to any other I have uploaded, and I receive nothing for the uploads nor for the information I put with those uploads. Although I do receive great joy from sharing these uploads with you, I have no wish to infringe on any existing copyright laws . DEF gp ddh ** (Ty, rpf16mm for your protection of this treasure.)

metadata.Writer: Bob Carney (screenplay), Wallace Fox (adaptation), Si Wills (screenplay)
metadata.Actors: Bob Carney, Si Wills, Lew Kelly, Gay Seabrook
